channel.title: Linux on 代码文思
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on 代码文思

item.title: Linux设置系统代理
item.description: # 设置代理 export http_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:20172 export HTTP_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:20172 export https_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:20172 export HTTPS_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:20172 export all_proxy=socks5h://127.0.0.1:20173 export ALL_PROXY=socks5h://127.0.0.1:20173 export no_proxy=localhost,127.0.0.0/8,::1 export NO_PROXY=localhost,127.0.0.0/8,::1 # 查看代理 echo $http_proxy # 取消代理 unset http_proxy unset HTTP_PROXY unset https_proxy unset HTTPS_PROXY unset all_proxy unset ALL_PROXY unset no_proxy unset NO_PROXY # git设置代理 git config --global http.proxy 'socks5://127.0.0.1:1080' git config --global https.proxy 'socks5://127.0.0.1:1080' # git取消代理 git config --global --unset http.proxy git config --global --unset https.proxy
